column2: an A.M. Eatery////To my disappointment (again) it was completely lacking in flavor. I tried each item separate - nothing. Peppered and salted and was somewhat better. Most Houstonians are used to (and expect) flavors. Throw some red pepper flakes
column3: salt anything into the cakes and they'll be great! Add some Worcestershire
column4: clam juice or olives to the bloody mary!
